meanings.definition: The quality or state of being impossible.
meanings.sent1: The teacher explained the impossiblenesses of flying without wings.
meanings.sent2: The team faced many impossiblenesses when trying to reach the mountain peak.
meanings.sent3: The cat's attempt to swim in the bathtub showcased the impossiblenesses of feline aquatic skills.
meanings.sent4: Her dream of becoming a mermaid highlighted the impossiblenesses of human anatomy.
meanings.sent5: The magician's trick revealed the impossiblenesses of defying gravity.

meanings.definition: The condition of being unable to be achieved or realized.
meanings.sent1: The student pondered the impossiblenesses of finishing the project in one night.
meanings.sent2: The athlete faced the impossiblenesses of breaking the world record in his first attempt.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel's quest to gather all the acorns in the park showed the impossiblenesses of hoarding.
meanings.sent4: The artist's masterpiece captured the impossiblenesses of capturing true beauty on canvas.
meanings.sent5: The explorer's journey highlighted the impossiblenesses of mapping uncharted territories.
